fields.description: Defines the styling applied to the button or if the button will displayed as a link. Ghost Dark has a fixed width and Ghost Dark Flex's size varies based on the length of the link label.
fields.label: Button Styling

fields.name: columns
fields.label: Columns
fields.description: Defines the number of columns. The maximum allowed columns are 6.

validation.customErrorMsg: Please enter a no. between 2 & 6 (both inclusive) only

fields.name: rows
fields.label: Rows
fields.description: Defines number of rows of columns. There is no limit to the number of rows that can be set.

validation.customErrorMsg: Please enter a no. greater or equal to 1

fields.name: classes
fields.description: Defines the alignment of the elements added to the Columns.

fields.name: style
fields.description: Defines the alignment of the Default Content added within the Section.

Display Top Margin
fields.description: Defines if the top margin is displayed. If toggled off, the top margin will not be displayed.
fields.name: tab-topmargin

fields.description: Defines the label that will appear in the Content Navigation, allowing the user to navigate directly to this section in the page.
fields.name: anchorlabel
fields.label: Anchor Label

fields.description: Defines the anchor ID that will appear in the URL when the user navigates to this section of the page. When authoring, instead of spaces between words, please use a hyphen ( - ).
fields.name: anchorid
fields.label: Anchor ID
Display in Content Navigation
fields.description: Defines if the Anchor Label will be displayed in the content navigation as a tab. If toggled on, the Anchor Label will be displayed.

fields.description: Defines the name of the section for analytics. Please define the Section Name in English.

fields.name: analytics_others
jcr:title
fields.label: Title
fields.description: Defines the the page meta title for SEO, as well as a title displayable in the page content (unless and overriding 'Page Title' below is defined).

fields.name: pageTitle
fields.label: Page Title
fields.description: Defines a page title that is displayable in the page content, instead of the 'Title'

fields.name: jcr:description
fields.label: Description
fields.description: Defines the the page meta title for SEO, as well as a title displayable in the page content (unless and overriding 'Page Title' below is defined).

fields.label: Tags
fields.name: cq:tags
fields.description: Defines the tags of the page used to classify content, making it searchable and discoverable for content authors.

fields.name: pagetype
fields.label: Page Type
fields.description: Defines the type of page, which is part of the page information used for analytics.

fields.name: headertype
fields.label: Header Variation
fields.description: Defines the variation of the header to be displayed. White background should be selected when the header should appear on a white background, while transparent should be selected when the header appears on top of a different coloured background.

fields.name: cq:canonicalUrl
fields.label: Canonical Url
fields.description: Overwrites the page's canonical url (set by search engines). If not set, the page's url will be the canonical url.

fields.name: cq:robotsTags
fields.description: Defines the robots tags to control search engine crawler behaviour.
fields.label: Robot Tags

fields.name: imageReference
fields.label: Image
fields.description: Defines the image to be displayed when sharing the link to the page.

fields.name: altText
fields.label: Alt Text
fields.description: Defines the alternative text that will be read by screen-readers for the image.

options.name: Play video only on mouse hover

fields.label: Loop Video

fields.label: Autoplay
fields.name: videoAutoplay
fields.description: Defines if the video will autoplay. If toggled on, the video will autoplay and will be always on mute even if mute video sound boolean is set to off.

fields.description: Defines if the video controls will be displayed. If toggled on, they will appear.

fields.description: Defines if the video will be play on mute. If toggled on, there will be no sound.

fields.description: Defines the page to which the user will be directed to.
fields.label: Link

fields.name: cta_imageCarouselLinkText
fields.description: Defines the text to be displayed in the button or as the link.
fields.label: Button/Link

fields.name: cta_imageCarouselLinkType
fields.label: Button Styling
fields.description: Defines the styling applied to the button or if the button will displayed as a link. Ghost Dark has a fixed width and Ghost Dark Flex's size varies based on the length of the link label.

fields.name: videoSlide_text
fields.description: Defines the text below the Video Slide.
fields.label: Text

fields.name: videoSlide_textType
fields.label: Text Type
fields.description: Defines styles for the text.

fields.name: videoSlide_videoTitle
fields.description: Defines the title of the video.
fields.label: Video Title

fields.name: videoSlide__videoText
fields.description: Defines the description of the video.
fields.label: Video Description

fields.name: videoSlide_desktopVideoPath
fields.label: Desktop Video Path
fields.description: Defines the path to a video on the desktop.

fields.name: videoSlide_mobileVideoPath
fields.label: Mobile Video Path
fields.description: Defines the path to a video on the mobile.

fields.name: videoSlide_videoPosterDesktop
fields.description: Defines the path that will be displaying poster image on desktop while loading the page.
fields.label: Desktop Poster Image Path

fields.name: videoSlide_videoPosterMobile
fields.description: Defines the path that will be displaying poster image on mobile while loading the page.
fields.label: Mobile Poster Image Path
Loop Video
fields.name: videoSlide_loopVideo
fields.description: Defines if the video will play on loop. If toggled on, the video will loop.

fields.label: Autoplay
fields.name: videoSlide_autoPlayVideo
fields.description: Defines if the video will autoplay. If toggled on, the video will autoplay and will be always on mute even if mute video sound boolean is set to off.

fields.label: Video Controls
fields.name: videoSlide_videoControlsVideo
fields.description: Defines if the video controls will be displayed. If toggled on, they will appear.

fields.label: Mute Video Sound
fields.name: videoSlide_muteSoundVideo
fields.description: Defines if the video will be play on mute. If toggled on, there will be no sound.

fields.label: Model Label Source
fields.name: content_labelsource
fields.description: Defines the source of the Model Labels displayed in the panels with the vehicles on the left-hand side of the DriveTrain Switch.

fields.label: Active Model Title
fields.name: detail_activemodel
fields.description: Defines the active model title to be displayed behind the image of the vehicle.

fields.label: Model Description
fields.name: detail_descp
fields.description: Defines the title that will appear above the Technical Data facts, e.g., BMW X2 SDrive18d. Placeholders like {model.description} can be authored.

fields.label: Technical Data Link
fields.name: detail_technocalLink
fields.description: Defines the Technical Data page to which the user will be directed to. Please add the full URL including https://

fields.label: Technical Data Link Label
fields.name: detail_technocalLinkText
fields.description: Defines the text to be displayed in the Technical Data button.

fields.label: Technical Data Button Stying
fields.name: detail_technocalLinkType
fields.description: Defines the styling applied to the button or if the button will displayed as a link.

fields.label: Enable Popover
fields.name: detail_popover
fields.description: Defines if a popover is enabled for this button.

fields.label: Disclaimer
fields.name: fragment_disclaimerLink
fields.description: Defines the Disclaimer Content Fragment that will be displayed in the DriveTrain Switch. Please select the relevant disclaimers per market and language under /content/dam/metafox/

fields.label: Technical Data Fact Label 1
fields.name: technical_fact1
fields.description: Defines the label appearing above the Technical Data Fact Value 1.

fields.label: Technical Data Fact Value 1
fields.name: technical_value1
fields.description: Defines value appearing underneath the Technical Data Fact Label 1. Placeholders can be authored to populate technical data values.

fields.label: Technical Data Fact Label 2
fields.name: technical_fact2
fields.description: Defines the label appearing above the Technical Data Fact Value 2.

fields.label: Technical Data Fact Value 2
fields.name: technical_value2
fields.description: Defines value appearing underneath the Technical Data Fact Label 2. Placeholders can be authored to populate technical data values.

fields.label: Technical Data Fact Label 3
fields.name: technical1_fact3
fields.description: Defines the label appearing above the Technical Data Fact Value 3.

fields.label: Technical Data Fact Value 3
fields.name: technical1_value3
fields.description: Defines value appearing underneath the Technical Data Fact Label 3. Placeholders can be authored to populate technical data values.

fields.label: Technical Data Fact Label 4
fields.name: technical1_fact4
fields.description: Defines the label appearing above the Technical Data Fact Value 4.

fields.label: Technical Data Fact Value 4
fields.name: technical1_value4
fields.description: Defines value appearing underneath the Technical Data Fact Label 4. Placeholders can be authored to populate technical data values.

fields.label: Model Group
fields.name: group_model
fields.description: Defines the grouping of the vehicles.

fields.label: Model Group
fields.name: group_modelType
fields.description: Defines the grouping of the vehicles.

fields.label: Model Group Item Link
fields.name: group_modelLink
fields.description: Defines the link to the page a user lands on when clicking on the panel with the vehicle image on the left-hand side of the DriveTrain Switch.

fields.label: Selected Model
fields.description: Defines if the model item and model card of this vehicle will be selected and displayed on the right hand side upon loading the DriveTrain Switch within a page. Please tick this option for the model card of the vehicle to be highlighted.
fields.name: group_selectedmodel

fields.label: Model Card Context
fields.name: wdh_customSeriesModelRangeSelection
fields.description: Defines the link to the page a user lands on when clicking on the panel with the vehicle image on the left-hand side of the DriveTrain Switch.

fields.label: Only if other is selected the following options should appear:
fields.name: analytics_others

fields.label: precon Context
fields.name: wdh_preconcustomvalues
fields.description: for testing purpose

fields.label: Shop By Look Context
fields.name: wdh_shopbylookcustomvalues
fields.description: for testing purpose

fields.label: Precon Context
fields.name: wdh_preconCustomModelRangeSelection
fields.description: Defines the link to the page a user lands on when clicking on the panel with the vehicle image on the left-hand side of the DriveTrain Switch.

fields.name: wdh_contextType
fields.label: Context Type
fields.description: Defines the type of context to be set.

fields.label: Link Label
fields.name: contexturalised_linkLabel
fields.description: Defines the text to be displayed in the contextualised button.

fields.label: Link
fields.name: contexturalised_linkText
fields.description: Defines the link of the contextualised button.

fields.name: speeddialgen_icontype
fields.label: Icon Type
fields.description: Defines the Icon to be displayed within the Speed dial next to the defined Link Label.

fields.name: speeddialgen_linkText
fields.label: Link Label
fields.description: Defines the text to be displayed in the button or as the link.

fields.name: speeddialgen_link
fields.label: Link
fields.description: Defines the page to which the user will be directed to. Please add the full URL including https://

fields.name: analytics_button
fields.label: Button/Link Type
fields.description: Defines the Button/Link type for event tracking in analytics. Please select Other for a CTA leading to another page on the BMW Serbia website.

fields.label: Only if other is selected the following options should appear:
fields.name: analytics_others

fields.label: Enable Automatic Data
fields.name: content_autoData
fields.description: Defines if automatic technical data will be pulled from the backend. If toggled on, the technical data values will be automatically fetched. If toggled off, the values and keys have to be manually authored in the Technical Data Spreadsheet.

fields.label: Enable Accordion View
fields.name: content_accordionView
fields.description: Defines if the technical data element categories will be displayed as an accordion item. If toggled on, they will be displayed as an accordion, which will by default be expanded and can be collapsed.

fields.name: content_spreadsheet
fields.description: Defines the Technical Data Spreadsheet that will be read if Automatic Data is toggled off.
fields.label: Technical Data Spreadsheet
Model Card Context
fields.name: wdh_customSeriesModelRangeSelection
fields.description: Defines the link to the page a user lands on when clicking on the panel with the vehicle image on the left-hand side of the DriveTrain Switch.

fields.label: Only if other is selected the following options should appear:
fields.name: analytics_others
